title: Services for Children of Substance Abusers Reauthorization Act
content: Modifies reporting and evaluation requirements. Authorizes appropriations. Removes provisions mandating: (1) coordination with the State lead agency and the State Interagency Coordinating Council under the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act. And (2) peer review as part of the grant awarding process. Authorizes grants for the training of personnel who provide services to children and families to assist the professionals in recognizing drug and alcohol problems and to enhance their skills in identifying substance abuse and obtaining early intervention, prevention, and treatment resources.
